summary: An email from March 2021 containing images and a brief text discussing a conversation about children, referencing an unnamed key male figure present at events and involved with a girl described as a 'sex slave' whose passport was taken. The sender notes this individual was not included in business meetings but was associated with 'Fing'rs Europe'.
keyFacts: The email references a conversation about children and includes images (IMG_2677.jpg, IMG_2678.jpg).
It mentions an unnamed male key player who was present at most events and was with a girl described as a 'sex slave' whose passport was taken.
The individual, though a key player, was not included in the sender's business meetings but was associated with 'Fing'rs Europe'.
The email is external and was sent from an iPhone, indicating informal communication.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00099879, EFTA00099880), suggesting it is evidence in the investigation.
